Akinbode Oluwafemi bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, onye na-eme mkpọsa ikpe ziri ezi na onye na-akwado nchịkwa ụtaba
Ọ bụ osote onye nduzi nke Environmental Rights Action/Friends of the Earth Nigeria (ERA/FoEN). Ọ bụ onye natara 2009 Bloomberg Awards maka Global Tobacco Control

E mere emume mmeri ahụ na 14th World Conference on Tobacco or Health nke emere na Mumbai, India. Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa na Corporate Accountability and Public Participation Africa (CAPPA) CAPPA, ebe o nwere ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ na-ahụ maka nhazi obodo, nkwado iwu na iwulite njikọ siri ike.
